data.actual_result: It half hides behind the white menu.
data.expected_result: It should scale along with the white panel instead of going behind it.
data.short_description: Resizing Discord to it's minimum height while having the help menu open will cause the search bar in the help menu to hide behind the white panel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Fullscreen discord - Open the help menu - Resize Discord to it's minimum height and see how the search bar is half hidden behind the other UI elements.
